Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: For consensus you will have a different algorithm or CC will do what is required with existing PoW?

Author: Alice#9607
Content: I think a combination of proof of "intelligence", i.e. the neural network model is improved by the miner, and a pow consensus for the fee earned by the miner

Author: Alice#9607
Content: improving the neural network model will stagnate, so its not optimal for consensus alone

Author: Alice#9607
Content: the key is to reward the miner for improving the model and to keep the good models safe from tampering
